TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed XmlFieldOrderOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: You should not use this enumeration; it is not used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute.XmlFieldOrder%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapTypeAttribute> class gets or sets a value of type XmlFieldOrderOption. However, the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure does not use the property's value.
